text: Everett Leslie "Terry" Fullam (July 1, 1930 - March 15, 2014) was an American priest, biblical scholar, and academic. He was best known to the Episcopal Church, and the Worldwide Anglican, Roman Catholic, and Protestant communities for his renewal ministries from 1972 to 1998. He was born in Montpelier, Vermont. Fullam died after falling health on March 15, 2014 in Ormond Beach, Florida. He was 82 years old. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Episcopalian clergy Category:People from Montpelier, Vermont Category:Academics from Vermont
title: Everett L. Fullam
